skill.name: performance-profiler
skill.description: Analyze code performance patterns and identify optimization opportunities.
skill.summary: Analyze code performance patterns and identify optimization opportunities.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown instructions for AI assistants. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or environment variable reads were detected. The skill is entirely declarative and safe.

content.value_statement: Performance issues in code waste resources and slow down applications. This skill identifies inefficient algorithms, memory leaks, and rendering problems, then provides specific code improvements with expected performance gains.
actual_capabilities: Identify inefficient algorithms and time complexity issues
Detect memory leaks and excessive allocations
Review bundle size and dependency usage
Provide code examples with optimization strategies
limitations: Cannot execute code or measure actual runtime performance
Cannot access external profiling tools or APIs
Analysis is limited to code patterns, not production metrics
Cannot modify files or deploy optimizations

use_cases.title: Fix React re-renders
use_cases.description: Identify unnecessary component re-renders and optimize React performance with memoization

use_cases.title: Optimize database queries
use_cases.description: Detect N+1 query problems and inefficient database access patterns

use_cases.title: Reduce bundle size
use_cases.description: Analyze large dependencies and identify opportunities to reduce application size

prompt_templates.title: Basic analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this code for performance issues and suggest optimizations:

prompt_templates.title: Specific focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the algorithms in this code. Identify any O(n²) or worse patterns and suggest O(n) alternatives:

prompt_templates.title: Frontend optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this React component for performance issues. Check for unnecessary re-renders, missing memoization, and memory leaks:

prompt_templates.title: Full report
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide a comprehensive performance analysis report including algorithm efficiency, memory usage, bundle size impact, and specific optimization recommendations with before/after code examples:

output_examples.input: Analyze this JavaScript function for performance issues
output: Issue found: Nested loop creates O(n²) complexity
Fix: Use a Map for O(1) lookups

best_practices: Always profile code before optimizing to identify actual bottlenecks
Focus on high-impact areas first rather than micro-optimizations
Measure actual performance improvements after implementing changes
anti_patterns: Optimizing code without measuring actual performance impact
Using entire libraries when only specific functions are needed
Ignoring memory leaks from uncleared event listeners or subscriptions

faq.question: Which programming languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with any programming language. Analysis focuses on patterns applicable to JavaScript, Python, Java, Go, and most mainstream languages.

faq.question: Can this skill measure actual runtime performance?
faq.answer: No. The skill analyzes code patterns conceptually. For actual measurements, use browser DevTools, clinic.js, or language-specific profilers.

faq.question: Does this skill integrate with build tools?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill for AI assistants. It does not directly integrate with webpack, Vite, or other build tools.

faq.question: Is my code data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. As a prompt-based skill, no code is stored or transmitted. Analysis happens within your AI session and stays local to that context.

faq.question: How is this different from Lighthouse or Chrome DevTools?
faq.answer: This skill analyzes source code patterns statically. Lighthouse and DevTools measure runtime performance in browsers. Use both for complete optimization.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with other AI coding tools?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides structured analysis that works with any AI coding assistant.
